name: Skeleton's night
description:
welcome to the skeleton's night.

Fibby and Tibby are the skeleton's holding the coffin as the other skeleton's are making space underground.
your job is to catch the skulls flying out from the underground.

move around by using
A to move left
D to move right

w/s can move forwards and backwards

x moves you downwards

space moves you up

try to catch as many points as you can before the timer ends :)
